31
Ontological Engineering
Slide 31
Ontology Requirements Specification. 
Task 4 (II)
Approaches:
Top-Down:
Complex
questions
are
decomposed in simple ones.
Bottom-Up: Simple questions that are organised
to form complex ones.
Middle out: Mix approach between top-down
and bottom-up.
speaker: SYSTEM
